name: Quik
description:
Ever wanted to play VVVVVV and Canabalt at the same time? No? Anyway, it doesn't matter, because now you can! 

Change gravity, dodge obstacles and get to the top of the leaderboard!

The game was made in 10 days for the 8 Bits to Infinity Jam #35 with the theme 'run' and 'gravity'.

All code, art and SFX were made by Arcy during the game jam.

CONTROLS:
Space/LMB - jump
Esc - Back
F4 - fullscreen toggle
